item.title: How to Use the Timer in Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Start the Timer How to Pause the Timer How to Reset the Timer No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: Watch a video tutorial: How to Start the Timer Step 1: First switch to Timer mode. Click the “Start” button. The Timer starts. How to Pause the Timer Step 1: Start a Timer. Click the “Pause” button. The Timer pauses. How to Reset the Timer Step 1: First pause a Timer.
